nodes.text: Seeratter was a site in the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. The pirate queen Maz Kanata hid a portion of the spoils from her reign there in a buried vault equipped with an antitamper sub-space alarm. As of when she marked Seeratter on a map in the Smuggler's Guide logbook at some point prior to or during 10 BBY, the alarm protecting the cache of treasure on Seeratter had not sounded.
Seeratter was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
